verbs.description: [ARG0: WASHINGTON D.C.] -- [V: Seeking] [ARG1: to fulfill his longstanding promise to lower drug prices] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] laid out his vision for increasing competition , reducing regulations and changing the incentives for all players in the pharmaceutical industry .
